name: 7 GRAND RPMEME
description:
Welcome! This is my super meme game that I made as a sacrifice to the meme gods, thanks for stopping by! I consider this game my tribute to SiIvaGunner, Vinesauce, and high quality rips. Please note that this is a fan game, so you might not get too much enjoyment out of it unless you are atleast a little bit familiar with the source material. Have fun!

(For a full playlist of the music I used, see https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLs9EhtIBXFF...)

https://twitter.com/FuzzyPicklesPro

https://twitter.com/KrunchyKarrot_
